action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tyrannosaurus makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 10 ft. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 17}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and can't be targeted by the tyrannosaurus's Tail.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 15 ft. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.
